title: Words Can Hurt Far More Than Sticks and Stones
text:
Words Can Hurt Far More Than Sticks and Stones 
Published By: Kotaku.com - Today 
Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day is one of the most depressing and yet ultimately uplifting anime series out there . And now its creators...
